citations.narrative:
***There is excess accumulation of excreta in the camel barn. The accumulations are across the floor and do not leave an
area where the camels could lay down without becoming contaminated by the excreta. Excess accumulation of excreta
increases the risk of disease hazards which may result in illness. The barns/shelter shall be cleaned at a frequency that
will prevent accumulations and thereby minimize disease hazard.
Correct by March 15, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Owner.
n

narrative:
3.131(a) 
   
Sanitation. 
***There is excess accumulation of excreta in the camel barn. The accumulations are across the floor and do not leave an 
area where the camels could lay down without becoming contaminated by the excreta. Excess accumulation of excreta 
increases the risk of disease hazards which may result in illness. The barns/shelter shall be cleaned at a frequency that 
will prevent accumulations and thereby minimize disease hazard. 
 
Correct by March 15, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Owner. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
